scripts.get-source: curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kawausokun/wcl-tooltip/master/README.md -o _includes/README.md; sed -i '/__SITE_DEMO__/c\{% include demo.html %}' _includes/README.md; sed -i 's/```\(.\+\)/{% highlight \1 %}/' _includes/README.md; sed -i 's/```$/{% endhighlight %}/' _includes/README.md
scripts.build: npm run get-source && npm uninstall wcl-tooltip && npm install && browserify javascripts/src/main.js -o javascripts/bundle.js && compass compile stylesheets
